name: Realm Explorer
blurb: A sandbox fantasy computer RPG.  Explore, fight enemies, craft items, mine ore and build buildings.  How will you craft your realm?

rewards.reward: Early Adopter Special!  Get a free full version digital copy of Realm Explorer upon its final release.  Early Adopters get this special price!  Help us kick-start our Kickstarter!
You will receive a free full version digital copy of Realm Explorer upon its final release.  You'll also have the thanks and gratitude of the development team!

Get into Realm Explorer with early closed Beta access.  You will be able to interact with the developers and community in the private beta forums and make suggestions  for changes to the game as we approach the final release.  You will also receive a free digital copy of the game on its final release.

The earliest access to Realm Explorer.  You will receive closed ALPHA access to the game as well as membership to a private Alpha-only forum.  You will be able to interact directly with the development team and your input will help shape the game.\r\n\r\nYou will also receive an exclusive in-game "Kickstarter" achievement; only given to those who participate in the Alpha.

Explorer Tier:  Get all of the previous rewards plus become a member of the Explorer Tier.  You will receive a limited edition real metal Realm Explorer coin designed by the Realm Source team commemorating your contribution to Realm Explorer.

Additionally you will receive an exclusive "Explorer" icon that appears next to your name while in the game; only available to people who back the Kickstarter project!

Note:  You will be given immediate access to the Alpha and Beta when they become available.  It may take up to the estimated delivery date for coins to arrive in the mail.  International shipping may take longer.

Founder Tier:  Get all of the previous rewards (including the collector coin) plus become a Realm Explorer Founder.  We will add your name or company name to the game credits.  You will also get special forum access to the Founder Club where you can talk with the dev team on a regular basis.  Additionally you will receive an exclusive "Founder" icon that appears next to your name while in the game; only available to people who back the Kickstarter project!

Elite Tier: Get all of the previous rewards AND get a special collectible metal "Realm Sigil" medallion designed by the Realm Source team.  Additionally you will receive an exclusive "Elite" icon that appears next to your name while in the game; only available to people who back the Kickstarter project!

Name an NPC: Get everything up to and including the Elite Tier plus submit a name to be randomly assigned to neutral NPCs in the game.  It can be your name, the name of a friend / family member, the name of a character from your table-top RPG days or a completely made up name.  If a fictional name it should be appropriate to a medieval fantasy setting, must be appropriate for all ages and cannot infringe on any existing copyrights (for example we can't use a name like "Luke Skywalker").

Create an Item: Get all of the previous rewards up to the Elite Tier AND provide the concept for an item you would like to see in the game.  The item must fit the medieval fantasy genre but can be anything from a wooden chair to a katana.  Our artists will create unique, high quality artwork and our development team will design the crafting requirements and item stats.  You just provide the idea!

Create Armor / Clothing:  Get all of the previous rewards up to the Elite Tier AND provide the concept for a set of armor or clothing you would like to see in the game.  The item must fit the medieval fantasy genre.  Skull armor?  Armor with spikes coming out of it?  A ballerina dress?  Now's your chance to get that piece of armor you've always dreamed of but never seen in a game before.
Create a Creature: Get all of the previous rewards up to the Elite Tier AND provide the concept for a creature.  The creature must fit the medieval fantasy genre and can be either monster or animal.

Ultra Package: Get everything up to and including the Elite Tier plus choose one from any of the previous "Create" tiers (Create an Item, Create Armor / Clothing and Create Creature).

In addition to all of that you will receive several exclusive items: a Realm Sigil medallion designed by the Realm Source team made of damascus steel, a high quality Realm Explorer poster signed by the entire dev team, a CD with the Realm Explorer sound track, a T-shirt in your size plus a call with the entire development team on Skype to discuss the game.

You'll also receive a physical DVD copy of the game that has been autographed by the development team in addition to the regular digital download.

Ultra Creator Package: Get everything in the Ultra Package ($5,000 reward) plus ALL of the following: Name THREE NPCs, Create an Item, Create Armor / Clothing and Create a Creature.\r\n\r\nYou get to provide a concept for one of each "Create" reward plus name three NPCs.  The ultimate package for someone who wants to create!

You will receive everything in the Ultra Creator Package ($7,500 tier) plus an invitation to the Realm Explorer launch party in Fabulous Las Vegas, Nevada!\r\n\r\nMeet with the development team and enjoy a night out on the town in Las Vegas.  Just take care of your transportation and lodging and we'll take care of the rest!
